pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic time-lapse from the bow of a large container ship sailing on the open ocean. The foreground is filled with stacks of colorful shipping containers, while the vast sea stretches out to the horizon. Above, a wide expanse of clouds moves rapidly across the sky, with the sun appearing as a bright, hazy orb.
